trans-unit.source: Represents a cell of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref> class.
Determines the final size and placement of the cell content.
The ArrangeOverride method determines the arrangement of the cell content with a gridline on the right.
The maximum size that the cell can occupy.
The final size of the control.
Gets or sets the column that the cell is in.
The column that the cell is in.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cell is in edit mode.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsEditing*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the cell can be put in edit mode.
Set the IsReadOnly property to `true` to make an individual cell read-only.
Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` to make all cells in an individual column read-only.

Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` to make all cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> read-only If there is a conflict between the settings at the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, column, and cell levels, a value of `true` takes precedence over a value of `false`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell cannot be put in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsReadOnly*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cell is selected.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected> event occurs when the IsSelected property is set to `true`.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Unselected> event occurs when the IsSelected property is set to `false`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected*> dependency property.
To be added.
Determines the desired size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref>.
The MeasureOverride method measures the area needed for the cell and the gridline on the right.
The maximum size that the cell can occupy.
The desired size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref>.
Called when the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column*> property changes.
This method is not called if changes are made to the current column definition.
It is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> property is set.
The old column definition.
The new column definition.
Returns the automation peer for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellAutomationPeer> exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation#initcap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomationsharpinitcap-md.md)].
The automation peer for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell"></xref>.
Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsEditing*> property changes.
This method changes the visual state of the cell between the Editing and Display states.
The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsEditing*> property.
Reports that a key was pressed.
This method passes keyboard input to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> that contains the cell.
Each column handles the input in a way that is appropriate for the column type.
The data for the event.
Reports that a key was pressed.
This method passes keyboard input to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> that contains the cell.
Each column handles the input in a way that is appropriate for the column type.
The data for the event.
Draws the cell and the right side gridline.
The drawing instructions for the cell.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
The OnSelected method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
The data for the event.
Reports text composition.
This method passes text input to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> that contains the cell.
Each column handles the input in a way that is appropriate for the column type.
The data for the event.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Unselected"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
The OnUnselected method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
The data for the event.
Occurs when the cell is selected.
This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A> property is set to `true`.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected"></xref> routed event.
To be added.
Occurs when the cell selection is cleared.
This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A> property is set to `false`.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Unselected"></xref> routed event.
To be added.
